Perceptor:

Perceptor cursed and transformed quickly to tank mode,  but he was  
injuried anyway.







--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:


> OOC: heh allusions
> 
> ::Kaiser::
>        Weary of the two front battle Kaiser uses his powerful 
wings to boost 
> himself into the air above the battle.  He lobs another concussion 
grenade 
> down between his two assailants.  The detonation causing a 
Shockwave without 
> actual explosive fire.
